greeting:
Hi everyone! I'm a help ticket bot, here to connect you and your questions to someone who can answer them. If you have any questions on how to use my functions, use `tic^help`.

よろしくお願いします~

tic~setAdmin.description: Set an existing Role as an administrator for this bot

tic~setHelper.description: Set an existing Role as a Ticket responder

tic~setHelpTextChannel.description: Set an existing text channel as a place to resolve Tickets

tic~setHelpVoiceChannel.description: Set an existing voice channel as a place to resolve Tickets

tic^help.description: Print out a list of commands that this bot can handle

tic^about.description: Print out a short description about this bot
